java.lang.String.export-success: Export UI config successfully, do you want to open its directory?
java.lang.String.file-not-supported: This image file is unsupported, do you want to select another?
java.lang.String.set-default-icon: Do you want to set this image as default icon?
java.lang.String.set-default-gif: Do you want to set this image as default gif?
java.lang.String.set-default-image: Do you want to set this image as default BG?
java.lang.String.input-nothing: Don't you want to input something?
java.lang.String.translation-too-long: This translation is too long, is it Ok?
java.lang.String.tip-removeUI: Remove Customized Icon, BG and GIF
java.lang.String.tip-favorite-tip-menu: Right-click or press ctrl+f to add to favorite.
java.lang.String.tip-battle-scene-tip-menu:
This setting can make battle scene more like to BC, start a battle to see the effect!
You can press number 6-0 on the keyboard to enable/disable some components in battle scene.
java.lang.String.tip-removeSwingTheme: Remove Swing And Nimbus Theme, which means you will only see and use Flat theme menus.
java.lang.String.tip-warning-when-change-theme: Warning: Using Flat theme may result in high CPU usage, is it okay?
